strings:
<voice_0x010016F1><se_low>*: Well! So this is Savella Cathedral!
What a perfect place for a grand royal wedding!

<voice_0x010016F2><se_low>*: Excellent work, young man!
You did an admirable job of escorting us.
Your duty here has now been fulfilled.
<voice_0x010016F3><se_low>*: You shall stay the night at the inn and return to Trodain tomorrow.

<voice_0x010016F4><se_high>Princess Medea: But...!?
I thought they'd all be attending the wedding!

<voice_0x010016F5><se_low>*: I'm sorry, Princess...
But I'm afraid that won't be possible...

<voice_0x010016F6><se_def>Prince Charmles: Well, well!
Pleased to make your acquaintance indeed.
I am Prince Charmles of Argonia.

<voice_0x010016F7><se_def>Prince Charmles: Goodness! You must be Princess Medea.
Charmed, I'm sure!
<voice_0x010016F8><se_def>Prince Charmles: One look at you is enough to make me forget all the other beautiful girls I've ever met!
<voice_0x010016F9><se_def>Prince Charmles: I'm the luckiest man in the world to have you as my wife.

<voice_0x010016FA><se_low>Yangus: Blimey! Wot's wiv all the romance!?
I didn't know you 'ad it in ya, Charmless!

<voice_0x010016FB><se_def>Prince Charmles: It's Charmles! Ah!
Aren't you those servants from the initiation?
<voice_0x010016FC><se_def>Prince Charmles: Hmph. No doubt you're here because you heard the news of my wedding. Well, I'm afraid this is as far as you can come.
<voice_0x010016FD><se_def>Prince Charmles: I can't possibly have commoners like you at such a grand royal affair.
<voice_0x010016FE><se_def>Prince Charmles: It's not as if you're aristocracy or wealthy, or, well, anything. Ha ha ha!

<voice_0x010016FF><se_def>Angelo: That brat is unbelievable! Can't let us in on account of our being too common, indeed!
The preening little snob!

<voice_0x01001700><se_def>Angelo: It's been a while since the initiation,
but he is still just as obnoxious as ever.
<voice_0x01001701><se_def>Angelo: And yet tomorrow he's going to be marrying the Princess... Can you believe it, <hero>!?

<voice_0x01001702><se_def>Angelo: Are you really going to let this happen?
If you ask me, it's your duty as chief of the palace guard to protect the Princess's happiness.
<voice_0x01001703><se_def>Angelo: Wait a minute! The ring! You still have the ring, don't you, <hero>? The one that belonged to your father!
<voice_0x01001704><se_def>Angelo: If you have it with you, go and show it to King Clavius!
<voice_0x01001705><se_def>Angelo: If he knew you were his nephew, he might just change his mind about this ridiculous marriage.
<voice_0x01001706><se_def>Angelo: Go and find him at the Lord High Priest's place and see what he says! It has to be worth a try!
